CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Prepare for Pickup stage positioned above or below the Select Carrier or Service stage?
SRP.A: The Prepare for Pickup stage is positioned {below} the Select Carrier or Service stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Begin Transportation?
VE.A: The value of stage Begin Transportation is {1574}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Search Transport Options?
VE.A: The value of stage Search Transport Options is {3388}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Search Transport Options, with a value of {3388}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Provide Feedback or Rating, with a value of {705}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Book Transport Service to stage Prepare for Pickup?
SC.A: Decreased by {487} Thousand Shipments from stage Book Transport Service to stage Prepare for Pickup.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Select Carrier or Service to stage Book Transport Service?
SC.A: Decreased by {446} Thousand Shipments from stage Select Carrier or Service to stage Book Transport Service.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 2712? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Search Transport Options} stage has {3388}, the {Select Carrier or Service} stage has {2935}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 912? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Provide Feedback or Rating} stage has {705}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 1347 and 2712? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Book Transport Service} stage has {2489}, the {Prepare for Pickup} stage has {2002}, the {Begin Transportation} stage has {1574}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Search Transport Options to Select Carrier or Service, or from stage Complete Delivery to Provide Feedback or Rating?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Search Transport Options} to {Select Carrier or Service} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Complete Delivery to Provide Feedback or Rating, from stage Prepare for Pickup to Begin Transportation, or from stage Search Transport Options to Select Carrier or Service?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Search Transport Options} to stage {Select Carrier or Service} is the greatest.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Begin Transportation to Complete Delivery, from stage Select Carrier or Service to Book Transport Service, or from stage Book Transport Service to Prepare for Pickup?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Book Transport Service} to stage {Prepare for Pickup} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Book Transport Service} and {Prepare for Pickup} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Complete Delivery} and {Provide Feedback or Rating} stages.
